programme.title: Alaska - Earth's Frozen Kingdom
programme.desc: Documentary following the fortunes of humans and animals over the course of a year in Alaska, which is by far the biggest US state and still one of the wildest places on Earth with deep forests and vast mountain ranges. The arrival of spring sees Alaska go through a huge transformation as water, light and warmth return, with animals emerging from hibernation and rushing to cash in on the riches of the season. Dougray Scott narrates.(n)

programme.title: Alaska - Earth's Frozen Kingdom
programme.desc: The land is bathed in 24-hour sunlight during the short Alaskan summer, luring hummingbirds up from Mexico, exposing deserts in the Arctic and relying on parachuting firefighters to tackle forest fires in its vast wilderness. Grizzly bears fatten up on a sudden wealth of salmon, a caribou calf joins a vast herd on its great migration and a huge male moose finds unlikely ways to impress a female. Among the human population, a dedicated grower of giant vegetables takes his half-ton pumpkin to the Alaska State Fair.(n)

programme.title: Alaska - Earth's Frozen Kingdom
programme.desc: To survive the bone-chilling cold, deadly blizzards and darkness of the eight months of an Alaskan winter takes courage, cunning and remarkable endurance. This episode tells the stories of how the tough and resourceful animal and human inhabitants of the windswept mountain peaks, icy tundra and snowbound forests face up to the challenges of the season.(n)

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the connections between the wildlife, landscape and people of the Arabian peninsula. The first edition features animals including oryxes, jerboas, horned vipers and scorpions, and a journey with the Bedouin - camel-riding nomads who are the only humans to have mastered the art of survival in the desert. Narrated by Alexander Siddig.(n)

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: Exploring the mountains of Dhofar in Oman, where the annual Indian Ocean monsoon has helped create a lost world of waterfalls and cloud forests filled with fascinating wildlife. The programme shows green sea turtles coming ashore in their thousands, shadowed by egg-stealing foxes, as well as footage of striped hyenas doing battle with Arabian wolves. Plus, a glimpse into the lives of chameleons, honey badgers and the elusive Arabian leopard.(n)

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: The changes that have swept across the Arabian peninsula since the discovery of oil. Camel racing has become a hi-tech sport and the region's animals now live alongside a very modern society, but technology is also being used to protect nature. The programme reveals how dugongs are fitted with satellite transmitters and hunting falcons chase down radio-controlled planes, and follows the construction of the world's first carbon-neutral city. Narrated by Alexander Siddig.(n)

programme.title: Alaska - Earth's Frozen Kingdom
programme.desc: Documentary following the fortunes of humans and animals over the course of a year in Alaska, which is by far the biggest US state and still one of the wildest places on Earth with deep forests and vast mountain ranges. The arrival of spring sees Alaska go through a huge transformation as water, light and warmth return, with animals emerging from hibernation and rushing to cash in on the riches of the season. Dougray Scott narrates.(n)

programme.title: Alaska - Earth's Frozen Kingdom
programme.desc: The land is bathed in 24-hour sunlight during the short Alaskan summer, luring hummingbirds up from Mexico, exposing deserts in the Arctic and relying on parachuting firefighters to tackle forest fires in its vast wilderness. Grizzly bears fatten up on a sudden wealth of salmon, a caribou calf joins a vast herd on its great migration and a huge male moose finds unlikely ways to impress a female. Among the human population, a dedicated grower of giant vegetables takes his half-ton pumpkin to the Alaska State Fair.(n)

programme.title: Alaska - Earth's Frozen Kingdom
programme.desc: To survive the bone-chilling cold, deadly blizzards and darkness of the eight months of an Alaskan winter takes courage, cunning and remarkable endurance. This episode tells the stories of how the tough and resourceful animal and human inhabitants of the windswept mountain peaks, icy tundra and snowbound forests face up to the challenges of the season.(n)

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the connections between the wildlife, landscape and people of the Arabian peninsula. The first edition features animals including oryxes, jerboas, horned vipers and scorpions, and a journey with the Bedouin - camel-riding nomads who are the only humans to have mastered the art of survival in the desert. Narrated by Alexander Siddig.(n)

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: Exploring the mountains of Dhofar in Oman, where the annual Indian Ocean monsoon has helped create a lost world of waterfalls and cloud forests filled with fascinating wildlife. The programme shows green sea turtles coming ashore in their thousands, shadowed by egg-stealing foxes, as well as footage of striped hyenas doing battle with Arabian wolves. Plus, a glimpse into the lives of chameleons, honey badgers and the elusive Arabian leopard.(n)

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: The changes that have swept across the Arabian peninsula since the discovery of oil. Camel racing has become a hi-tech sport and the region's animals now live alongside a very modern society, but technology is also being used to protect nature. The programme reveals how dugongs are fitted with satellite transmitters and hunting falcons chase down radio-controlled planes, and follows the construction of the world's first carbon-neutral city. Narrated by Alexander Siddig.(n)

programme.title: Alaska - Earth's Frozen Kingdom
programme.desc: Documentary following the fortunes of humans and animals over the course of a year in Alaska, which is by far the biggest US state and still one of the wildest places on Earth with deep forests and vast mountain ranges. The arrival of spring sees Alaska go through a huge transformation as water, light and warmth return, with animals emerging from hibernation and rushing to cash in on the riches of the season. Dougray Scott narrates.(n)

programme.title: Alaska - Earth's Frozen Kingdom
programme.desc: The land is bathed in 24-hour sunlight during the short Alaskan summer, luring hummingbirds up from Mexico, exposing deserts in the Arctic and relying on parachuting firefighters to tackle forest fires in its vast wilderness. Among the human population, a dedicated grower of giant vegetables takes his half-ton pumpkin to the Alaska State Fair.(n)

This episode tells the stories of how the tough and resourceful animal and human inhabitants of the windswept mountain peaks, icy tundra and snowbound forests face up to the challenges of the season.(n)

programme.title: Orgazmo
programme.desc: To earn money to return to Utah and marry his sweetheart, a young Mormon missionary is enticed into becoming a porno superhero. Donning a costume, he and a campy sidekick battle villains with a unique weapon(n)

programme.title: Death Proof
programme.desc: Quentin Tarantino's stylish and violent homage to exploitation cinema following a psychopathic stunt man (Kurt Russell) as he stalks young women. With Mary Elizabeth Winstead. (2007)(n)

programme.title: The Natural
programme.desc: A once promising young baseball player returns to the mainstage fifteen years later, in an attempt to restart his career after battling the demons of his past. But, it is the choices he makes with the women in his life that could lead to his downfall again(n)

programme.title: Spaceballs
programme.desc: A wild and star-studded parody of 'Star Wars', in which the fair Princess Vespa must be rescued from the malevolent clutches of arch-villain Lord Dark Helmet, giving rise to a series of heroic escapades(n)

programme.title: That Thing You Do!
programme.desc: During the 1960s in Erie, Pennsylvania, some young men start a rock group. Soon their dreams come true when one of their songs becomes a big hit, but the pressures of success bring the members of the band into conflict. Tom Hanks wrote, directed, and starred in this nostalgic drama(n)

programme.title: Sons of Liberty
programme.desc: A Dangerous Game. Part 1 of 3. Sam Adams is pursued by British authorities; riots break out in Boston(n)

programme.title: Sons of Liberty
programme.desc: The Uprising. Part 2 of 3. Paul Revere sets off on his legendary ride; British troops battle American colonists(n)

programme.title: Sons of Liberty
programme.desc: Independence. Conclusion. The Revolutionary War begins(n)

programme.title: Sons of Liberty
programme.desc: The Uprising. Part 2 of 3. Paul Revere sets off on his legendary ride; British troops battle American colonists(n)

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: When a Miami-mob loan shark is sent to LA to collect a debt from a producer of low-budget films, he pitches him an idea for a picture instead of breaking his legs. Pretty soon the shark finds himself in his element with criminal predators of the Hollywood variety. This clever adaptation of Elmore Leonard's novel features cameos from Harvey Keitel and Bette Midler, and a sparkling score from John Lurie(n)

programme.title: Sons of Liberty
programme.desc: Independence. Conclusion. The Revolutionary War begins(n)

programme.title: Hatfields & McCoys
programme.desc: Part 1. Part 1 of 3. A McCoy is murdered by a Hatfield and a forbidden love affair begins at the start of the legendary Hatfield-McCoy family feud, which nearly brought the states of Kentucky and West Virginia to civil war in the 1880s(n)

programme.title: Hatfields & McCoys
programme.desc: Part 2. Part 2 of 3. The Hatfields seek revenge after one of theirs is murdered by a McCoy. When friends and neighbors join the fighting, West Virginia and Kentucky are brought to the brink of civil war(n)

programme.title: Hatfields & McCoys
programme.desc: Part 3. Conclusion. The Hatfields are forced deeper into the mountains; Johnse Hatfield eyes another McCoy woman; and the fighting between the two families peaks in a New Year's Day battle(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's terrifying masterpiece about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. But when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant Great White, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again. Based on Peter Benchley's best-seller, three sequels and numerous imitators followed. Steven Spielberg(n)

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: After suffering a humiliating defeat at the hands of hungry young boxer Clubber Lang, Rocky is rejuvenated by his former rival Apollo Creed, who trains Rocky for a rematch against the fearsome mohawked rival, and helps him regain "the eye of the tiger."(n)

programme.title: Bolt
programme.desc: Animated adventure. Bolt is the cute superhero dog star of a fictional TV show, who does not realise he is part of a TV show and believes his powers are real. When he mistakenly believes his human co-star is in danger, he embarks on a trek across America to save her life(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman returns as forensic psychologist Alex Cross (first seen in Kiss the Girls) who links up with Secret Service agent Vezzie Flannigan, responsible for the mistake that let brilliant but deadly psychopath kidnap a senator's daughter. As the clock ticks away, the pair realise that this crime is just the beginning in Lee Tamahori's nail-biting adaptation of James Patterson's outstanding thriller(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: The film focuses on the last few days of news anchor Dan Rather and producer Mary Mapes, after questions were raised about their controversial report on the special privilege and connections of President Bush in order to avoid fighting in the Vietnam War(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's terrifying masterpiece about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. But when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant Great White, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again. Based on Peter Benchley's best-seller, three sequels and numerous imitators followed. Steven Spielberg(n)

programme.title: The Comancheros
programme.desc: A Texas Ranger runs across a gang of white renegades, called the Comancheros, who are trading guns and other contraband with marauding Comanches from a secret hideout in Mexico. He goes undercover as a partner with a vicious outlaw who is a contact man with the Comancheros and knows the whereabouts of their hideout in Mexico. Director Michael Curtiz's last film(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman returns as forensic psychologist Alex Cross (first seen in Kiss the Girls) who links up with Secret Service agent Vezzie Flannigan, responsible for the mistake that let brilliant but deadly psychopath kidnap a senator's daughter. As the clock ticks away, the pair realise that this crime is just the beginning in Lee Tamahori's nail-biting adaptation of James Patterson's outstanding thriller(n)

programme.title: Kiss of Death
programme.desc: Remake of the 1947 thriller about a former thief turned family man who finds his efforts to stay on the straight and narrow hampered by his underworld contacts. His cousin coerces him into helping out with one more job, but when it goes wrong the family face the wrath of a psychopathic mobster(n)

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage's Oscar winning performance in Mike Figgis' film sees Cage as a scriptwriter who's in love with the bottle. Taking his payoff, he heads to Las Vegas, where life (and booze) can be enjoyed 24 hours a day. Co-starring Elisabeth Shue as the hooker he falls for, this is by turn bleak and moving, as Cage's slow, awful self-knowing self-destruction becomes both his reason for living and his reason for dying(n)

programme.title: Windtalkers
programme.desc: A powerful, true story about members of the Navajo tribe who proudly served the U.S. in WWII as code talkers by using their native language as a code to relay information to military leaders. Unbeknownst to the Navajo is the dark secret that they're to be killed by American soldiers if one of them is in danger of being captured(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Ben Gates is off on another thrilling treasure hunt in this action-packed sequel involving a missing page from John Wilkes Booth's diary, which leads to a globe-trotting race to find an ancient city of gold(n)

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: A revolutionary medical technique allows an undercover agent to take the physical appearance of a major criminal and infiltrate his organisation(n)

programme.title: 8MM
programme.desc: Tom Welles (Nicolas Cage) is a surveillance expert on the rise. He's living the American dream with a wife, Amy (Catherine Keener), infant daughter, and a house in the suburbs of Harrisburg, Pennsylvania. After the completion of an assignment for a U.S. Senator, Welles is summoned to the house of a recently deceased captain of industry. His widow, in settling his estate, has discovered an 8MM film in her late husband's private safe. The silent short depicts the apparent murder of a young woman by a large, masked figure, what is known as a "snuff" film. Greatly disturbed by the film's contents, the widow hires Welles to find the identity of the woman and determine if she is still alive. Welles finds the girl's identity and follows her trail from the time she ran away from home to Hollywood. Once there, Welles meets adult bookstore clerk Max California (Joaquin Phoenix) to act as Virgil to Welles' Dante. As the two begin their descent into the world of underground pornography, the detective grows more and more distant from his family, as if he cannot shake the taint of the world in which he now walks. Tom and Max eventually meet pornographers Dino Velvet (Peter Stormare) and Eddie Poole (James Gandolfini). By this time the detective finds he can no longer walk out of the inferno(n)

programme.title: The Package
programme.desc: Berlin, 1989. For some the Cold War is over, but for an American army sergeant, things heat up when he is assigned to escort a military prisoner back from Germany to stand trial in the US. Once on home ground, the soldier finds he is being used as a pawn in a chilling Russian-American conspiracy plot. A political paranoia thriller from the director of 'The Fugitive'(n)

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Four years later, Brody now finds himself in a race against time when a new killer shark attacks ten boats manned by teenagers, which include his own sons(n)

programme.title: Supercross
programme.desc: Charged performances by Steve Howey and Mike Vogel kick-start this high-octane thrill ride about driven motorcycle-racing brothers competing against each other on the professional circuit. K.C. Carlyle (Howey) lands a lucrative sponsorship with a factory team, but younger brother Trip (Vogel), the better rider, must make his way as an independent "privateer." Real-life motocross star Tyler Evans has a cameo as himself. Directed by Steve Boyum. Cameron Richardson, Sophia Bush, Robert Carradine(n)

programme.title: Titan A.E.
programme.desc: Animated sci-fi adventure about a group of humans searching for a secret space station following the destruction of Earth by a nefarious alien race. With the voices of Matt Damon and Drew Barrymore(n)

programme.title: Godzilla: Tokyo S.O.S.
programme.desc: Fifty years after he first attacked Tokyo, Godzilla is back on the rampage in this monster opus from Toho Studios. After numerous rounds of combat with Japan's most furious monsters, the robotic beast Mechagodzilla is in for some much needed repairs when a handful of sprites appear before the scientists putting the machine back in fighting shape. The enchanted ones warn the scientists that their actions could have grave consequences, but it isn't long before Godzilla, the most fearsome of all monsters, returns to the scene to prove his might once and for all. What's more, Godzilla is joined by Mothra for a reign of terror that threatens to devastate the island. With few alternatives, Japan's leaders pit the repaired Mechagodzilla against Godzilla and Mothra, but it quickly becomes unclear if the robot will obey its human creators or join forces with the flesh-and-blood monsters(n)

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: A hard-living superhero who has fallen out of favor with the public enters into a questionable relationship with the wife of the public relations professional who's trying to repair his image(n)

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Four years later, Brody now finds himself in a race against time when a new killer shark attacks ten boats manned by teenagers, which include his own sons(n)

programme.title: Jaws: The Revenge
programme.desc: The man-eating shark wants revenge on Brody's widow, pursuing her and her marine biologist son to the Bahamas(n)

programme.title: Titan A.E.
programme.desc: Animated sci-fi adventure about a group of humans searching for a secret space station following the destruction of Earth by a nefarious alien race. With the voices of Matt Damon and Drew Barrymore(n)

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Megaguirus
programme.desc: The Big Green Guy launches yet another attack on Japan, but this time the humans are prepared for him---though not for the arrival of a second monster. Misato Tanaka, Shosuki Tanihara. Motohiko: Masato Ibu. Yoshino: Yuriko Hoshi(n)

programme.title: Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla
programme.desc: A Japanese scientist (Shin Takuma) creates a giant cyborg creature to do battle with the prehistoric beast. Yumiko Shaku. Directed by Masaaki Tezuka(n)

programme.title: Godzilla: Final Wars
programme.desc: Giant monsters are rampaging in cities across the globe, and as the Earth Defense Force struggles to find a way to defeat the malicious mutants, their only hope lies frozen in the Antarctic in Versus director Ryuhei Kitamura futuristic entry into the long-running kaiju series. In the near future, Earth is being decimated by monsters that have been mysteriously unleashed in every major city from New York to Sydney, and as the world population falls into a paralyzing state of panic, the Earth Defense Force must stage a daring initiative to save the human race. After a giant unidentified flying object suddenly appears and vaporizes the beasts in a matter of seconds, the relieved citizens of Earth are comforted to hear that the newly arrived alien race is seeking to make a peace treaty with humankind. All is not as it seems, however, and as the nefarious aliens reveal their true nature, it's up to Godzilla to take back the planet -- or die trying(n)

programme.title: Godzilla: Tokyo S.O.S.
programme.desc: Fifty years after he first attacked Tokyo, Godzilla is back on the rampage in this monster opus from Toho Studios. After numerous rounds of combat with Japan's most furious monsters, the robotic beast Mechagodzilla is in for some much needed repairs when a handful of sprites appear before the scientists putting the machine back in fighting shape. The enchanted ones warn the scientists that their actions could have grave consequences, but it isn't long before Godzilla, the most fearsome of all monsters, returns to the scene to prove his might once and for all. What's more, Godzilla is joined by Mothra for a reign of terror that threatens to devastate the island. With few alternatives, Japan's leaders pit the repaired Mechagodzilla against Godzilla and Mothra, but it quickly becomes unclear if the robot will obey its human creators or join forces with the flesh-and-blood monsters(n)

programme.title: Godzilla, Mothra and King Ghidorah: Giant Monsters All-Out Attack
programme.desc: After sandblasting away years of camp and bad scripts from the Gamera franchise to form a couple of tight-scripted, vastly entertaining flicks, Shusuke Kaneko gives the same treatment to the granddaddy of kaiju eiga characters: Godzilla. The film opens with Godzilla waking up from his underwater hideaway. Unseen since his 1954 attack on Tokyo, the monster is spotted by a Japanese submarine. Though government officials seem reluctant to confront the problem, Navy Admiral Tachibana (Ryudo Uzaki), who witnessed the rampage when he was a child, is more than a little alarmed. Meanwhile, Tachibana's daughter Yuri (Chiharu Niiyama), who works at a struggling TV station, is making a documentary in the mountains of Niigata Prefecture. One night, they experience a massive earthquake and that next morning they learn that a gang of motorcycle punks were crushed in a mountain tunnel and witnesses reportedly saw some sort of fire-breathing creature in the rubble. Later, a group of campers in southern Kagoshima prefecture are crushed by some Thing that crawled out of Lake Ikeda. Soon Japan is awash with monsters -- including Baradon, a monster that looks like a pug terrier with Mickey Mouse ears, and King Gidora, a three-headed beast with a lethal 50-meter tail -- busting up things north, south, east, and west(n)

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: An alienated young man joins a brutal club whose members relieve their frustrations by beating each other to a pulp(n)

programme.title: Candyman
programme.desc: A grad student encounters a hook-handed urban legend in Chicago's Cabrini Green housing projects(n)

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: The civilian crew of a drilling station are called in to save sailors in a nuclear submarine stuck on the seabed of the Atlantic. But they aren't the only ones interested in the lost sub. Deep sea chiller(n)

programme.title: Impostor
programme.desc: Gary Sinise stars in this mind-bending adaptation of a classic story by legendary sci-fi author Philip K. Dick. In 2079, a military scientist (Sinise) desperately tries to prove his true identity after he's accused of being a booby-trapped android from outer space. Vincent D'Onofrio, Madeleine Stowe, Tony Shalhoub(n)

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens mistake images of 1980s arcade games as a sign of aggression, they attack Earth with evil versions of Pac-Man, Donkey Kong and other video-game characters. In response, the US president asks his old gamer pals to battle the invaders(n)

Judd Apatow and Shauna Robertson produce a script co-penned by star Rogen and Evan Goldberg(n)

programme.title: Live French Open Tennis
programme.desc: The seventh day's play at Roland Garros, where the third-round singles matches are scheduled to conclude in the second Grand Slam tournament of the year. Eventual champion Novak Djokovic ended the run of Great Britain's Aljaz Bedene at this stage last year with a dominant 6-2, 6-3, 6-3 victory. In the women's competition, top seed Serena Williams prevailed 6-4, 7-6 against Kristina Mladenovic, and her sister Venus was also victorious, beating Alize Cornet 7-6, 1-6, 6-0. Meanwhile, 200 champion Ana Ivanovic's run came to an end she was beaten 6-4, 6-4 by Elina Svitolina.(n)

programme.title: Live French Open Tennis
programme.desc: The eighth day's play at Roland Garros, featuring fourth-round singles matches in the second Grand Slam tournament of the year. Andy Murray continued his run to the final at this stage in 2016 with a 7-6. 6-4. 6-3 victory over John Isner, while 2015 champion Stan Wawrinka defeated Viktor Troicki 7-6, 6-7, 6-3, 6-3, and home favourite Richard Gasquet overcame fifth seed Kei Nishikori 6-4, 6-2, 4.6, 6-2. In the women's competition, eventual champion Garbine Muguruza prevailed 6-3, 6-4 against 2009 title-winner Svetlana Kuznetsova, and Shelby Rogers won by the same scoreline against Irina-Camelia Begu.(n)

programme.title: French Open Tennis
programme.desc: Action from the eighth day's play at Roland Garros, where the fourth-round singles matches were scheduled to get under way in the second Grand Slam tournament of the year.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A man who died after being knocked down by a van is revealed to be a professional hitman responsible for at least six contract killings - and his next target was to be a navy lieutenant commander. Meanwhile, Abby is delighted at being a match for a teenager who needs a kidney transplant, but she is informed that someone else with very similar DNA has also been identified as suitable. Has she found a relative she never knew about? Guest starring Brett Tucker (Neighbours).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The murder of a coastguard officer on board an abandoned cargo ship draws the team's attention to a family of Lebanese refugees hoping to find a new home in America. Meanwhile, Tony and McGee try to find the perfect woman for Gibbs. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Sean Murray.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The body of a Navy lieutenant is found on the side of a remote road and toxicology tests reveal he died of overhydration. When another man is found dead nearby, the NCIS team begins to suspect a serial killer is on the loose. Meanwhile, Ducky introduces Gibbs to his new girlfriend. Crime drama, guest starring Cheryl Ladd.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Homeland Security employee Victor Sterling mysteriously disappears and his car is found at a drive-through restaurant that becomes the scene of a double murder. To complicate matters further, the missing man's outspoken spouse happens to be the ex-wife of both Gibbs and Fornell. American naval crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, Joe Spano, Tom Gallop and Melinda McGraw.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. A military aircraft transporting the bodies of dead US marines back home crashes before reaching its destination, and Gibbs and the team are called in to help identify human remains at the site of the wreckage. However, a DNA discrepancy turns a routine investigation into a search for a missing person. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Torres brings out old case notes and contacts when a US Marine's murder is linked to a dirt-bike gang, one that he joined as part of an undercover sting operation.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine Sergeant is found dead in a national park, forcing Gibbs and his team to collaborate with Mounted Police Sergeant May Dawson to solve a string of related crimes.(n)

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Benny goes on trial for misconduct in a case related to his work with the District Attorney's office, and Bull teams up with criminal lawyer JP Nunnelly to defend him.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A pupil at a school for troubled youngsters is found beaten to death in a forest. A hand-drawn map discovered in a dormitory leads Kimball and Wayne to a run-down shack where they find a volatile man who has been harassed by a secretive gang of children hurling paint at his property, shouting abuse and breaking his windows. Suspecting the group could be behind the boy's death, Patrick sets up an elaborate sting involving a campfire, a ghost story and a willing volunteer. Simon Baker stars.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A 19-year-old girl is dumped in California after being stabbed to death, with her twin sister still missing and the crime bearing the hallmarks of Red John. A love letter leads the team to a blind woman who is able to provide a rough description of the killer using her other senses, prompting Patrick to put his life on the line in a bid to catch the man who murdered his own family. Dexter's Geoff Pierson guest stars, with Simon Baker, Robin Tunney and Amanda Righetti.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane employs dubious tactics to catch the killer of a woman who was accused of stealing $1million from her employer. Setting up camp in an empty house near the victim's home, he pins a mysterious note to the door and settles back to wait, optimistic the killer will fall for the bait. Elsewhere, a messy result in another case leads CBI boss Virgil Minelli to take Lisbon off the Red John investigation. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and the team are called to Sacramento, where the body of an aide to state senator Melinda Batson has been found. They arrest her stepbrother on suspicion of murder, but Jane believes political blackmail could have been the motive behind the killing, and begins his own investigation into the case. Crime drama, guest starring Paul Michael Glaser (Starsky and Hutch), with Simon Baker, Robin Tunney and Fay Masterson.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A child molester Lisbon caught and convicted in San Francisco is found shot dead near CBI headquarters in Sacramento, but when the gun is found to have her prints on it, she is accused of the murder. Unable to remember the night of the crime, she tries to prove her innocence by undergoing a polygraph test - which she fails, leaving her no choice but to ask Jane for help. Drama, starring Robin Tunney and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.desc: Chris learns he is the heir to his grandfather Carter's fortune, but he refuses to take the money - leaving Peter to resort to desperate measures to keep the wealth in the family. Animated comedy, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter takes up smoking, and is quickly approached by an advertising executive who wants him to be the face of a new campaign - for an anti-smoking group. Meanwhile, Stewie helps Chris battle some school bullies.(n)

programme.desc: A broke Hayley gets an office job and falls for a cute colleague, prompting her to consider embarking on an affair while on a work retreat to Belize. programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter and his friends fight to save their favourite booth in the Drunken Clam after it is claimed by another group of men. Meanwhile, Brian passes on herpes to Stewie. Adult animation, featuring the guest voice of Bryan Cranston (Breaking Bad).(n)

programme.desc: Francine's lonely housewife novel is up for an award, so the family heads to the Big Apple for the ceremony, while Stan and Hayley spend time with actor Robert Wuhl.(n)

programme.desc: Stan witnesses a couple die in a car crash, so goes to see a psychiatrist to help with the trauma. Meanwhile, Roger and Klaus study for a wine tasting.(n)

programme.desc: Meg has fun partying with Peter when he takes her to a college for an interview, and Brian has to learn how to live in the wild after being sprayed by a skunk and forbidden from entering the house.(n)

programme.desc: Stan feels his manhood is threatened when Francine becomes an estate agent and starts earning more than he does. Steve sets up a fighting arena in one of his mother's empty properties, enlisting homeless people to take part in no-holds-barred bouts, but his father muscles in on the money-making scheme.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Hayley decides she has had enough of being bossed around at home and moves in with her boyfriend. In an attempt to bring her back, Stan confiscates her credit card - so she finds a way to earn ready cash by becoming a stripper instead.(n)

programme.desc: Part two of two. Gibbs has to be stopped when he tries to employ methods similar to those used on Kinah and Lala in an effort to gain information, but Vance has a trick that gives the agents an idea of what the siblings have in mind.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony is forced to tackle a case with a personal element when his father is discovered drunk in a car that has a dead body in the boot. programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: US Navy captain Jake Marsden is murdered in his hotel room and inquiries lead to marine lieutenant Emma Reynolds - who tells the team she was the intended target. programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a Navy commander last seen in the company of a mysterious blonde woman, who turns out to be missing NCIS agent and Tony's ex-lover EJ Barrett. She identifies the murderer as Seal-turned-assassin Marcellus Dane, who is suspected of working for Casey Stratton - a member of black ops unit Phantom Eight. Guest starring Sarah Jane Morris.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An estate agent and two clients discover the body of Lt Com Maya Burris, a naval attache who had been working in Egypt, and her detective husband Nick arrives on the scene to demand answers. Using documents discovered on the victim's boat, Abby links her to Barry Norton, who is suspected of having sold government secrets to a Middle Eastern terrorist group known as the SRC.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane and Lisbon investigate the death of a biker gang's lawyer, who they suspect was murdered because he knew too many of the members' secrets. However, another lead is uncovered when they meet a woman who held a grudge against him because he successfully defended her brother's alleged murderer in court. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: An architect is found dead at his mansion by a police officer who claims a ghost could have had some involvement in the murder. Elsewhere, Rigsby confesses his true feelings to Grace. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker, Owain Yeoman and Amanda Righetti.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Bosco arrests Jane after discovering the bug in his office, leaving Cho and the other agents to investigate a murder case. Guest starring Ashley Jones (True Blood), with Simon Baker and Terry Kinney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Bosco and Lisbon reluctantly team up to investigate the kidnapping of a woman from a wealthy family. Crime drama, starring Terry Kinney, Robin Tunney and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and the team are shocked to discover serial killer Red John targeted the CBI headquarters while they were out on assignment, leaving two agents dead and seriously wounding Bosco. programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A factory worker is branded a spy after an attempt to take a virtual vacation goes horribly awry. Later, he joins a resistance movement in order to defeat a high-tech tyrant, and tries to recover his true identity in this mind-bending sci-fi thriller(n)

programme.title: The Wolverine
programme.desc: Hugh Jackman reprises his role as the clawed mutant in this action-packed X-Men spin-off(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Simpsons 138th Episode Spectacular!. Troy McClure hosts a retrospective featuring Simpsons history and trivia, and series "outtakes," including an alternate ending to the "Who Shot Mr. Burns?" episode and a burping contest between Barney and baseball's Wade Boggs(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Simpsons Spin-off Showcase. Troy McClure hosts three spin-off stories from The Simpsons television show. Featuring the voice of the late Phil Hartman(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Behind the Laughter. The Simpsons discuss their fame in a behind the scenes look at the show(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Helter Shelter. The Simpsons participate in a reality show called "1895 Challenge," in which they live without modern conveniences. When ratings start to sink, the producers add a celebrity---David L. Lander from "Laverne & Shirley." Boxing's Larry Holmes has a cameo(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Today I Am a Clown. Krusty's rabbi father (Jackie Mason) helps him prepare for his bar mitzvah, which includes Mr. T; Homer guest hosts for Krusty and is a hit. Dan Castellaneta, Harry Shearer, Hank Azaria(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A Star Is Torn. American Idol winner Fantasia guest stars as Lisa's rival in a singing competition. Will Homer's songwriting make or break Lisa?(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: 24 Minutes. In a parody of the action series 24 , Bart (as the agent in the field) and Lisa (based at CTU - the Counter Truancy Unit) must stop bullies Dolph, Kearney and Jimbo from releasing the ultimate stink bomb at the school's annual bake sale(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Politically Inept, With Homer Simpson. After his videotaped rant about airport security goes viral, Homer lands a radio talk show, and considerable political influence. Then he endorses rock star Ted Nugent (who provides his own voice) for president(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: A group of amnesiac teens awaken in a deadly maze, and search desperately for an escape route while gathering clues that could reveal the reason for their imprisonment. Meanwhile, dreams of a shadowy organisation hint at a sinister agenda(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: A group of amnesiac teens awaken in a deadly maze, and search desperately for an escape route while gathering clues that could reveal the reason for their imprisonment. Meanwhile, dreams of a shadowy organisation hint at a sinister agenda(n)

programme.title: Thunderbirds Are Go
programme.desc: International Rescue is called in to save the first manned space mission to Mars from sinister hijacker The Hood, and ensure a second attempt goes to plan. Puppet adventure based on Gerry Anderson's TV series, featuring the voices of Shane Rimmer, Ray Barrett, Alexander Davion, Peter Dyneley, Sylvia Anderson and Cliff Richard, voicing a puppet version of himself.(n)

programme.title: Parental Guidance
programme.desc: A busy mother turns to her parents for help in looking after her three children while she and her husband are working. However, family relations are soon strained to breaking point when it becomes clear that the two generations have very different ideas about childcare. Comedy, with Billy Crystal, Bette Midler and Marisa Tomei.(n)

programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: A domesticated rare bird is taken to Rio de Janeiro to mate with a female, but the pair are stolen by animal smugglers. He ends up lost on the streets of a strange city, and to make it back to his owner, he will have to learn to fly for the first time in his life. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jesse Eisenberg and Anne Hathaway.(n)

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Cellmates Fletcher and Godber are coerced into aiding an escape attempt organised by the sinister Grouty. However, the two jailbirds contrive to break back into prison before their absence is detected by the formidable Mr Mackay. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Ronnie Barker, Richard Beckinsale, Peter Vaughan, Fulton Mackay and Brian Wilde.(n)

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: A climatologist warns global warming will soon result in destructive freak weather, or even another ice age. He thinks the world still has time to prepare for the worst, but the crisis happens almost immediately - and as storms, earthquakes and hurricanes strike in terrifying fashion, he races across America to rescue his son from a frozen New York. Disaster thriller, with Jake Gyllenhaal and Dennis Quaid.(n)

programme.title: The Grey
programme.desc: Eight oil rig workers end up stranded in the middle of the Alaskan tundra when the plane flying them home crashes. With limited supplies, they must make a gruelling journey across the icy wilderness to civilisation, but their situation is made more perilous when a pack of ferocious wolves begins stalking them. Adventure, starring Liam Neeson, Frank Grillo and Dermot Mulroney.(n)

programme.title: The Hole
programme.desc: Two brothers left alone in their new house discover a mysterious hole in the basement. Aided by a girl living next door, they explore the dark depths in search of treasure, only to end up in a strange world where they must each face their own worst fears. Joe Dante's horror, starring Chris Massoglia, Haley Bennett, Nathan Gamble, Teri Polo and Bruce Dern.(n)

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A writer moves into a house where several people died years previously, but keeps the building's dark history a secret from his family. While researching a book on the incident, he discovers a series of old cine films of the deaths, but as he watches them, he uncovers a supernatural force behind the tragedy. Horror, starring Ethan Hawke and Juliet Rylance.(n)

programme.title: Picture Perfect
programme.desc: An ambitious executive hires a man to pose as her fiance to give her a stable image at work and attract a colleague who is only tempted by unavailable women. However, her fantasy life soon spirals out of control, leaving her unable to tell the difference between fact and fiction. Romantic comedy, with Jennifer Aniston, Jay Mohr, Kevin Bacon, Olympia Dukakis and Illeana Douglas.(n)

programme.title: Judy Moody and the Not Bummer Summer
programme.desc: A girl looking forward to the summer holidays is faced with a boring break when she realises her friends are going away. However, the future brightens up when she goes to stay with her eccentric aunt and embarks on a series of manic adventures. Comedy based on Megan McDonald's series of children's books, starring Jordana Beatty and Heather Graham.(n)

programme.title: ParaNorman
programme.desc: A misunderstood boy is able to communicate with ghosts haunting his neighbourhood, but no one else believes they exist. When a curse placed on the town by a witch centuries ago causes zombies to rise from the grave, it falls to the youngster to avert disaster. Animated adventure, with the voices of Kodi Smit-McPhee and John Goodman.(n)

programme.title: Mirror Mirror
programme.desc: A princess is banished to a dark forest after the death of her father, leaving her wicked stepmother to rule over the kingdom. The exiled aristocrat joins forces with a band of rebellious dwarfs to reclaim her father's throne and stop the evil queen seducing the prince she is in love with. Fantasy, starring Julia Roberts, Lily Collins and Armie Hammer.(n)

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: A single man gets the chance to turn his unhappy life around when his father reveals that they both have the ability to travel through time and change their personal history. He uses his newfound talent to try to improve his love life and win the heart of an American woman he has fallen for. Romantic fantasy comedy, with Domhnall Gleeson, Rachel McAdams and Bill Nighy.(n)

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: A retired CIA agent survives an assassination attempt and realises something in his past has made him a target. He sets out to reunite the members of his old hit squad to find out who is trying to kill them and why, but in the process, uncovers dangerous secrets. Action thriller, with Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich and Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: 48 Hrs
programme.desc: A hard-bitten cop goes on the trail of two escaped fugitives who killed several of his fellow officers. He needs someone with inside knowledge of the criminals, and is reluctantly forced to temporarily release a fast-talking thief from prison to help him in his investigation. Comedy thriller, starring Nick Nolte, Eddie Murphy and Annette O'Toole.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa - Back to Basics
programme.desc: The chef prepares a roasted shrimp with feta in exchange for an ice cream master-class from friend and creamery owner Rori Trovato.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa - Back to Basics
programme.desc: American chef and cookbook writer Ina Garten prepares tomato crostini and whipped feta. Plus, she makes thyme roasted marcona almonds as a cocktail snack.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa - Back to Basics
programme.desc: American chef Ina Garten enjoys a casual dinner in the garden and prepares Israeli couscous and tuna salad, with raspberry crumble bars for dessert.(n)

programme.desc: Ree Drummond demonstrates how to prepare her own take on comforting home cooking, including steak Oscar; fillet topped with roasted asparagus spears.(n)

programme.desc: Ree Drummond invites friends and family over for a festive get-together and rustles up food including tenderloin sandwiches.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver provides tips on hosting a barbecue and demonstrates simple rules that guarantee properly cooked food every time. programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Chef Jamie Oliver cooks three dishes to show the versatility of beans, using legumes he picked from his garden - home-made baked borlotti beans, a hearty runner bean stew and a marinated French bean salad.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver focuses on dishes containing onions, garlic and leeks, using them to produce simple meals including a salad, soup, and roast pork with an onion and potato al forno. He also chats to a gardener about the health benefits of raw garlic.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver uses a variety of carrots in an Indian salad, demonstrates how they can be used to complement a pork chop and discovers why the vegetable is orange. He then prepares foil-roasted smoked beetroot with beef and a cottage cheese dressing.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Chef Jamie Oliver rustles up simple, seasonal dishes and demonstrates how to cook using home-grown potatoes. programme.desc: Jamie Oliver cooks using peppers and chillies. The menu includes a spicy pork goulash and an experimental dish of smoked salmon with a zingy salsa. He also joins Brian for a taste-test of the hottest chilli in the world - and it is the loyal gardener who keeps his cool.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home

programme.title: The Interviews
programme.desc: Archive chats with Peter Cook and Dudley Moore, the double act that changed the face of British comedy. Straight from the Oxbridge Footlights, the irreverent, surreal and controversial duo were at the forefront of the new satire and alternative comedy boom of the 1960s, leaving behind a much imitated legacy of laughs. Dawn French narrates.(n)

programme.title: The Two Ronnies
programme.desc: Alan Price and Georgie Fame guest on the vintage comedy show, starring Messrs Barker and Corbett.(n)

programme.title: The Two Ronnies
programme.desc: Vintage comedy, including the sketch Done to Death. Plus, music by Elaine Delmar who sings Summer Knows.(n)

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Victor and Margaret are trapped in the shed by a swarm of escaped bees - and not unexpectedly where the mishap-prone Meldrews are concerned, that is just the start of their troubles. Richard Wilson and Annette Crosbie star.(n)

programme.title: The Two Ronnies Spectacle
programme.desc: The three-part documentary concludes with a look at the duo's musical numbers and the ongoing serial sketches that became a hallmark of the long-running comedy series.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Beware of Laughing at Nora's Hats.
programme.desc: Alvin tries to persuade Nora Batty to go for a ride in his sidecar, but she's having none of it. When she relates the story of her long-standing feud with Audrey Craig - who had the audacity to laugh at her hat during a wedding many years ago - it becomes clear the broom-brandishing battleaxe is not one to be messed with.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Yours Truly - If You're Not Careful.
programme.desc: Billy and Alvin learn that Truly's ex-wife is trying to find him, and waste no time in gleefully tormenting their pal with the news of a strange woman's appearance in town. Long-running comedy, starring Peter Sallis and Frank Thornton.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Clegg, Truly, Alvin and Billy encounter a stranger who is determined to travel by canal to Ilkley in an inflatable swan. However, when punctures disrupt the man's dream, Entwistle is on hand to ensure the voyage goes to plan. Tommy Cannon and Bobby Ball guest star.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del and Rodney make a bit of cash on a used-car deal and decide to celebrate in style with a night out in the West End. Vintage comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del gets his hands on a statue of a Hindu god - which plunges him into the middle of an age-old feud between rival families. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: One of Del's old flames turns up out of the blue, so Rodney and Grandad resolve to extinguish any passion that might still be smouldering in the Peckham wide boy's heart. Vintage comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del-Boy acquires three tons of lead sheeting, which turns out to be a DIY nuclear fallout shelter, so he, Rodney and Grandad collect their sleeping bags and food and have a practice run to make sure they will know what to do if the Russians attack.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: After lending assistance to a wealthy woman in distress, Del seizes a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to improve his social standing by launching his own chandelier-cleaning business. As part of the venture, he ropes a reluctant Rodney and Grandad into helping him. David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst star.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Rodney dates an artist who turns out to be the daughter of the Duke of Maylebury. Del sees the chance for the Trotter family to marry into the aristocracy, and disastrously gatecrashes a party at the Duke's country estate. Christmas special from 1986, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del-Boy cannot believe his ears when Rodney tells him he has found a girlfriend. The trouble is, the woman is old enough to be his mother - and to make matters worse, her husband is about to be released from prison.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del jumps at the opportunity to decorate the local Chinese restaurant to make a quick profit, and the results are outstanding in more ways than one. Comedy, with David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del and Rodney reluctantly agree to let Grandad accompany them on their holiday abroad - a decision they come to regret. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del gets the chance to sell off a couple of antique urns - the only problem being that one of them contains the ashes of Trigger's late grandfather. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, Lennard Pearce and Roger Lloyd Pack.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del takes up cards in his latest bid to make his first million - much to the annoyance of Rodney and Grandad, who reckon he will end up gambling away all their worldly goods. Comedy with the wheeler-dealing Trotter family, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: Steve Coogan is commissioned to review half a dozen restaurants for a Sunday newspaper and plans the trip with his American girlfriend - only to face the prospect of a week of meals-for-one after she dumps him. So Steve calls old friend Rob Brydon to accompany him, and the pair find themselves debating the big questions of life over a series of delightful dishes. Improvised comedy in which the stars play versions of themselves, directed by Michael Winterbottom.(n)

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: Steve and Rob enjoy a taster menu at L'Enclume in the Cumbrian village of Cartmel as they continue their culinary tour of the north of England, reviewing restaurants for a Sunday newspaper. Comedy, starring Steve Coogan and Rob Brydon.(n)

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: Steve and Rob continue their culinary tour of the north of England in the Lake District. They stay at Samuel Taylor Coleridge's old home Greta Hall in Keswick, visit William Wordsworth's former residence Dove Cottage, and have lunch at Holbeck Ghyll. Starring Steve Coogan and Rob Brydon.(n)

programme.title: Black Books
programme.desc: Fran returns from holiday and discovers Manny has resigned and started work at Goliath Books, leaving Bernard to run the shop alone. After sifting through rubbish, rotting food and dead badgers, she resolves to get the errant employee back - but his new boss has no intention of letting him go. With Dylan Moran, Bill Bailey and Tamsin Greig, and guest star Simon Pegg.(n)

programme.title: Black Books
programme.desc: Bernard and Manny are appalled by the nonsensical tales peddled to young readers - so set out to pen their own children's book and get rich on the proceeds. Meanwhile, Fran embarks on a hen weekend with her closest friends from school. Dylan Moran and Bill Bailey star, with Lucy Davis (The Office) and Olivia Colman (Broadchurch).(n)

programme.title: Monty Python's Best Bits (Mostly)
programme.desc: A celebration of all things Python. Bill Bailey, Harry Shearer and Kate Beckinsale are among those paying tribute, while classic clips include The Lumberjack Song. Presented by Hugh Bonneville.(n)

programme.title: Nighty Night
programme.desc: In the final episode of the series, Jill's misdeeds begin to catch up with her. Glen escapes from the mental institution seeking revenge, and Cath has her suspicions when Jill's pregnancy enters its 11th month. However, Don is too drunk and depressed to cope with anything.(n)

programme.title: Big Train
programme.desc: Comic skits and sketches, with Amelia Bullmore, Julia Davis, Simon Pegg, Mark Heap and Kevin Eldon.(n)

programme.title: Steve Coogan: Live 'n' Lewd
programme.desc: A 1994 performance by the actor and comedian, featuring characters including foul-mouthed Mancunian Paul Calf and his sister Pauline, aspiring comic Duncan Thickett and handyman Ernest Moss. The show also includes an appearance by John Thomson in his guise as entertainer Bernard Righton.(n)

programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.desc: Victor and Margaret are trapped in the shed by a swarm of escaped bees - and not unexpectedly where the mishap-prone Meldrews are concerned, that is just the start of their troubles. Richard Wilson and Annette Crosbie star.(n)

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Victor takes up life drawing classes and Margaret is only too happy to see the back of him - until she learns the subject is a nude woman whom he has volunteered to drive home. Comedy, starring Richard Wilson and Annette Crosbie.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The rundown state of the flats in Nelson Mandela House prompts Rodney to join the residents' committee, and he soon finds himself hobnobbing with council officials - a situation Del quickly exploits. Starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del encounters an old flame from almost 20 years previously, and Rodney experiences the joys of dating - but the brothers soon face awkward questions from the past. David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst star, with Diane Langton (The Rag Trade).(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Uncle Albert has a nasty fall into the cellar at the Nag's Head, but turns his injury into a profit-making opportunity - eagerly egged on by wheeler-dealer Del-Boy. Vintage comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del and Rodney mourn Grandad's death, and feel gratified to see such a good turn-out of friends and relatives at his funeral - even if most people are more interested in the food afterwards. However, one of the guests, a certain long-lost seafaring uncle, ends up outstaying his welcome. Long-running comedy, introducing Buster Merryfield to the cast as Uncle Albert.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: The Long Legs of the Law.
programme.desc: Rodney starts going out with a policewoman, much to the consternation of dodgy dealer Del-Boy, who is terrified that one wrong word from his little brother could see him banged up for five years. Vintage comedy, starring Nicholas Lyndhurst, David Jason and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: Steve and Rob visit the world-famous Malham limestone pavement and eat at the Yorke Arms, as they continue their culinary tour of the north of England, reviewing restaurants for a Sunday newspaper. Comedy, starring Steve Coogan and Rob Brydon.(n)

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: The duo visit Bolton Abbey and eat breakfast at the Angel Inn at Hetton in North Yorkshire. On the journey back to London from their culinary tour of the north of England, they stop off at Steve's parents' house. Comedy, starring Steve Coogan and Rob Brydon.(n)

programme.title: I'm Alan Partridge
programme.desc: Alan accepts a large sum of money to host a corporate sales conference, but an incident at the country club prevents the event running smoothly. programme.title: Two Fat Ladies

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: The semi-finals begin with the eight hopefuls split into teams of four and challenged to the Relay Invention test, in which both groups must come up with a single dish between them. Using a chicken and a range of vegetables, herbs and spices, each team member has just 20 minutes to make their contribution - but as they cannot speak, they must leave clues behind to help their team-mates decipher what the dish is supposed to be.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: The knockout stage continues, and if the amateurs thought it was tough getting this far, the upcoming round will really sort the dishwashers from the chefs. Over the next two nights the remaining contestants are split into two groups and get their first taste of professional cooking. Tonight's hopefuls head to London restaurant Typing Room, overseen by Lee Westcott, where they serve up every dish during a busy lunchtime service. Then it's back to the studio for an Invention Test - but adding to the pressure, they'll be presenting their food to MasterChef: The Professionals judge and formidable perfectionist Monica Galetti. After this, one of them will be hanging up their apron and going home.(n)

programme.title: Floyd on Fish
programme.desc: Keith Floyd visits St Malo's large fish market in Brittany, France, before going to a restaurant owned by Jacques Yves Cadiou. He also visits an oyster farm at Cancale, and prepares his favourite dish, bourride, at the Chalut eaterie.(n)

programme.title: Floyd on Fish
programme.desc: The chef buys the ingredients for bouillabaisse and visits the Duchy of Cornwall's oyster farm on the Helford River, before preparing mussels in their kitchen.(n)

programme.desc: Keith Floyd samples the culinary delights of New Orleans, including crawfish pie and gumbo.(n)

programme.title: August Rush
programme.desc: Kirsten Sheridan's family drama stars Freddie Highmore as Evan Taylor, a musical prodigy searching for his parents. When pregnant cellist Lyla Novacek was hit by a car, her controlling father and manager told her she'd lost the baby; in reality she gave birth prematurely and her father sent the infant to an orphanage. Eleven years later, when Evan finds out that his parents are alive, he sets out to find them, taking inspiration from the music around him. The heart of the film is Evan's almost mystical ability to 'feel' music, a challenging concept that is rendered believable thanks to inventive work from the composer of the main score, Mark Mancina. Also starring Jonathan Rhys Meyers as Evan's rock singer father, and Robin Williams as a modern-day Fagin who Evan meets during his search for his family(n)

programme.title: Get Smart
programme.desc: Steve Carell is Maxwell Smart, a covert agent who often finds himself out of his depths but never out of options. It's CONTROL veruss KAOS all over again as this action comedy based on a beloved hit TV series from the sixties pits Agent 86 against a nuclear scheme by the evil spy conglomerate. Partnered with sexy and capable Agent 99 (Anne Hathaway), he navigates the world of multifunction pocketknives and exploding dental floss to hilarious effect. The all-star cast is rounded up by Dwayne Johnson, Terence Stamp, Alan Arkin and James Caan(n)

programme.desc: No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Mommy Dead and Dearest

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Director Michael Bay returns with his second instalment of the sci-fi action romp that pits humans against some big, bad alien robots, the Decepticons. In this sequel, which manages to be even louder and more prone to explosions than the initial outing, Sam Witwicky (Shia LaBeouf) and his girlfriend Mikaela Banes (Megan Fox) are once more at the centre of the action. Witwicky is being hunted down by the Decepticons, who recognise that he is the main impediment to them gaining control of an awesome source of energy. As the Decepticons' plan would result in the destruction of the sun, mankind's fate rests on the shoulders (and in the ingenuity) of our oddly named hero... Edited for language and violence(n)

programme.title: The Village
programme.desc: The people of Covington, a small town in rural Pennsylvania lead peaceful lives, only rarely disturbed by the creatures that inhabit the woods surrounding the village. An agreement has been reached with the creatures and peace prevails under the condition that the boundaries are respected. Yet this balance is disrupted when Lucius Hunt (Joaquin Phoenix), an inquisitive and willful young man, ventures himself beyond the limits of the village. After this, things will never be the same. Written and directed by M. Night Shyamalan, this is his third film after the huge success of The Sixth Sense(n)

programme.title: Rushmore
programme.desc: After the highly acclaimed independent film Bottle Rocket, director Wes Anderson followed up with a quirky Touchstone Studios film entitled Rushmore. Written by Anderson and friend Owen Wilson (an actor in Armageddon and Anaconda), they created the story of Max Fischer, a highly eccentric 15-year-old boy who attends the tenth grade at Rushmore Academy. Played by Jason Schwartzman (Talia Shire's son and Francis Ford Coppola's nephew), Max is a poor student with big dreams and a love of extracurricular activities. Max is editor of the school newspaper and yearbook, president of the chess, astronomy, French, and German clubs, captain of the fencing team, and director of the school play. Max is also a compulsive liar, telling everyone that his barber father (Seymour Cassel) is really a brain surgeon. Suddenly Max falls in love with Miss Cross (Olivia Williams), a first-grade teacher at the school. He also makes a new friend in business tycoon Mr. Blume (Bill Murray), an eccentric millionaire who also loves Miss Cross. The love triangle heats up as Max refuses to believe that his age has anything to do with Miss Cross refusing his romantic advances. Also Max's scheme to erect an aquarium on the school baseball diamond gets him booted out of Rushmore Academy. As his life crumbles around him, he is forced to grow up and accept the consequences of his actions and his lies. He throws himself more into his extracurricular activities, hoping to redeem himself by staging the most ambitious school play ever attempted(n)

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Hugely successful businesswoman Michelle Darnell (Melissa McCarthy) is convicted of insider trading and sentenced to prison. After being released, she is forced to move in with a long-suffering employee of hers (Kristen Bell), and tries to earn redemption and revamp her public image by helping a group of young girls in their quest to sell brownies. Peter Dinklage, Kristen Schaal, and Kathy Bates co-star in this comedy, which was directed by Ben Falcone (McCarthy's real-life husband), and co-written by McCarthy, Falcone, and Steve Mallory(n)

programme.title: Friday
programme.desc: An unemployed young man avoids his father and a bully while trying to help his best friend pay back a debt to a drug dealer(n)

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: Former Saturday Night Live "Weekend Update" co-anchors Tina Fey and Amy Poehler co-star in this baby-fever comedy about a single, career-oriented woman who previously put parenthood on hold, and is forced to hire a surrogate mother when she discovers there is only a one-in-a-million chance that she will be able to get pregnant. Kate Holbrook (Fey) is a 37-year-old business executive who has always put her professional life before her personal life, but these days her biological clock is ticking louder than ever before. As with everything else she has accomplished in life, Kate is determined to have a child on her own terms. Unfortunately for Kate, the chance of her ever becoming pregnant is slim to none. Undaunted, a willful Kate drafts South Philly working-class girl Angie Ostrowiski (Poehler) -- a woman who may just be her polar opposite -- to be a surrogate mother. Subsequently informed by the head of the surrogacy center (Sigourney Weaver) that her surrogate is indeed pregnant, the excited mother-to-be soon purchases every child-rearing book she can find and excitedly begins the nesting process. But life hasn't quit throwing Kate curveballs just yet, because when a pregnant Angie shows up on her doorstep with no place to live, the woman who once thrived on order finds her life descending into chaos. Now, as Kate attempts to transform Angie into the ideal expectant mother, this odd couple will discover that families aren't always biological, but occasionally formed through friendship as well. Writer Michael McCullers, who authored the screenplays for Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me and Undercover Brother in addition to working on Saturday Night Live, makes his feature directorial debut with a self-penned screenplay(n)

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: This biopic of airline pilot Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger depicts his successful emergency landing of an Airbus A320 on the Hudson River in January 2009. In the aftermath of this unprecedented feat, he must endure the weight of sudden fame, second-guessing by investigators and his own doubts about his actions that fateful day(n)

programme.title: The Sweetest Thing
programme.desc: When it comes to dating, Christina Walters has a golden rule: avoid searching for Mr. Right and focus on Mr. Right Now. That is until one night at a club when she unexpectedly meets Peter, only to see him suddenly disappear the next day. She and her best friend Courtney decide to break the rules and go on a road trip to find him, encountering numerous misadventures along the way(n)

programme.title: Screwed
programme.desc: Scott Alexander and Larry Karaszewski, who scripted "Ed Wood" and "Man on the Moon," co-directed and co-wrote this frenetic farce about a chauffeur (Norm Macdonald) who steers into big trouble when he kidnaps the pooch of his wealthy, tyrannical boss (Elaine Stritch). Danny DeVito, Dave Chappelle, Daniel Benzali, Sherman Hemsley, Sarah Silverman, Malcolm Stewart(n)

programme.title: The Village
programme.desc: The people of Covington, a small town in rural Pennsylvania lead peaceful lives, only rarely disturbed by the creatures that inhabit the woods surrounding the village. An agreement has been reached with the creatures and peace prevails under the condition that the boundaries are respected. Yet this balance is disrupted when Lucius Hunt (Joaquin Phoenix), an inquisitive and willful young man, ventures himself beyond the limits of the village. After this, things will never be the same. Written and directed by M. Night Shyamalan, this is his third film after the huge success of The Sixth Sense(n)

programme.title: Race
programme.desc: Based on the life of legendary black Olympian Jesse Owens, who became the greatest track and field athlete in history at the world stage of the 1936 Olympics by winning four gold medals. He achieved this amazing feat under the gaze of Adolf Hitler(n)

programme.title: Taking Care of Business
programme.desc: A convicted car thief walks away from minimum security prison after winning tickets to the world series. When he finds a wealthy businessman's planner, he takes a trip to return the items - on the businessman's dime and name(n)

programme.title: Ferrell Takes the Field
programme.desc: Will Ferrell plays baseball in five spring training games for 10 different teams on one day in March 2015 as a fund-raiser for cancer research, and to honor former major leaguer Bert Campaneris, who played every position in a game in 1965 for the Kansas City A's(n)

programme.title: King Ralph
programme.desc: Sometimes a family title, among the nobility of England, goes to the "collateral" heirs -- people not in the direct line of decent, like cousins, great-nephews and the like. On rare occasions, these people are not even aware that they are about to be elevated to the House of Lords, and they have been living more-or-less ordinary lives. In this comedy, the family which lacks direct heirs is the Royal Family of England -- as all of the likely heirs have died one after the other in swift succession. In this comedy, the "collateral heir" is an exuberant, fence-busting All-American slob (and pretty good rock n' roll musician) by the name of Ralph (John Goodman). Unknown to him, his grandmother had an affair with a royal prince. Ralph's a good guy, and eager to please. He recognizes the importance of the royal hoopla to England and works very hard to fit in as its new designated king. He is assisted by the ever-unctuous, very serious family factotum Willingham (Peter O'Toole). The trouble is, he doesn't have instincts for politics English-style, and he is constantly "putting a foot wrong," as they might say. The most difficult situation for him is when he develops a new love interest, and she's not "acceptable" to the upper crust. In addition to being hounded by the tabloids, he finds that "the good of the state" requires that he drop his new girlfriend. Things really come to a head just before Ralph's coronation as king. Reviewers generally loathed this feel-good comedy, but audiences seem to have enjoyed it tremendously, and it has done well in video and TV airings(n)

programme.title: Renaissance Man
programme.desc: Danny DeVito stars in this thoughtful comedy about Bill Rago, an advertising executive who gets fired from his job and is forced to take on an army job teaching poorly educated boot camp recruits to read. With a little ingenuity, he gets them reading Shakespeare's Hamlet, but finds opposition in the guise of Sgt Cass (Gregory Hines), who dislikes civilians and thinks he is wasting his time teaching screw-ups to think for themselves. Also stars Ed Begley Jr and a young Mark Wahlberg(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Boss'
programme.desc: A look at "The Boss," a 2016 comedy about a successful businesswoman jailed for insider trading who seeks redemption upon her release. The film stars Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell and Peter Dinklage, and is directed by Ben Falcone(n)

programme.title: Ready to Rumble
programme.desc: Riotous humor goes to the mat in this bone-crushing, pro-wrestling comedy. When their favorite rasslin' star is banished from the sport, two sewer workers (David Arquette, Scott Caan) flush out a plan to get their depressed hero back in the ring for good. Oliver Platt, Joe Pantoliano, Rose McGowan(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Now You See Me 2'
programme.desc: A look at "Now You See Me 2," the 2016 sequel to the 2013 thriller that follows the Four Horsemen's return to perform a spectacular stunt in the hopes of clearing their name and exposing the unscrupulous behavior of a tech mogul. The film stars Jesse Eisenberg, Mark Ruffalo and Woody Harrelson, and is directed by Jon M. Chu(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar!
programme.desc: Eddie Mannix is a Hollywood 'fixer', and is part of the upcoming production starring superstar actor Baird Whitlock(n)

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: Tom Cruise, in his breakthrough role, stars as Joel Goodson, a straight-A student left in charge of the house by his holidaying parents. Grabbing the Porsche, he heads downtown and picks up a glamorous hooker. She's on the run from her pimp and when she sees Joel's house, she has an idea: seduce him and persuade him to turn it into a high class bordello for just one night, so she and her friends can relieve his friends of their cash. All goes well until her pimp turns up looking for payback in Paul Brickman's sex comedy that rises above the genre to be both entertaining and provoking(n)

programme.title: Grumpy Old Men
programme.desc: Two neighbours, who have been bitter rivals ever since a youthful feud over a woman, renew their animosity when an attractive widow moves in across the street. The new arrival is a welcome diversion for the old adversaries, and when they both attempt to woo her, only one can win her affections. When it becomes clear that the widow is interested only in commitment and her new lover has other ideas, she begins to doubt her original decision(n)

programme.title: Major Payne
programme.desc: Hawk-like Marine Corps officer Benson Payne (Damon Wayans) attempts to whip into shape the usual assortment of misfit JROTC kids in this minor remake of The Private War of Major Benson. Of course, both the major and his pint-sized recruits have something to teach one another. Payne teaches them the value of self-discipline and instills self-confidence in them, and the recruits teach him to stop and smell the roses (not to mention the fact that kids sometimes need coddling rather than screaming). And, of course, there is the annual JROTC statewide competition, which the kids are obligated to win before the movie can end. While there are some funny moments (the major's exhibition in full-dress whites at a school dance, for example), the script seems too color-by-numbers to be interesting to anyone other than undiscriminating younger viewers(n)

programme.title: Catch Me if You Can
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Frank W. Abagnale was employed as a doctor, a lawyer, and as a co-pilot for a major airline company-all before reaching his 21st birthday. A successful con artist and master of deception, Frank is also a brilliant forger, whose skill at check fraud has netted him millions of dollars in stolen funds - much to the chagrin of the authorities(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar!
programme.desc: Eddie Mannix is a Hollywood 'fixer', and is part of the upcoming production starring superstar actor Baird Whitlock(n)
