programme.desc: A black comedy about a frustrated puppeteer who gains access to John Malkovich's brain via a small portal in his office(n)

programme.title: Spanglish
programme.desc: A Mexican immigrant working as a maid for an affluent L.A. couple has to maintain control of her own daughter, who wants to assimilate(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Two paranormal researchers join forces with a nuclear engineer and a subway attendant to fight off a slew of ghosts that have invaded New York City. Eventually, they come face-to-face with an evil entity who can control human beings(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: The gang from Friday and Next Friday are back in this urban comedy, in which Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) have finally moved out of their respective parents' homes and gotten an apartment together. Curry), have gone into business together running a barbecue joint. Craig and Day-Day are installed as security guards, and while Craig tries to make time with Donna (K.D. Aubert), a saleswoman at the Pimp N' Ho's Boutique, and keep things orderly at Holy Moly's Doughnut Shop, Day-Day attempts to transform himself into a master of crime-fighting, which causes a lot more problems than it solves. Friday After Next is the first feature film from director Marcus Raboy, who previously directed music videos for Sting, Li'l Kim, Staind, and Friday After Next star Ice Cube(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: The film revolves around the rivalry between the owners of a small gym named Average Joe's and Globo-Gym, a big-budget gym located across the street(n)

programme.title: Stripes
programme.desc: Bill Murray has joined the Army, and the Army will never be the same! When John Winger loses his job, his car, his apartment and his grilfriend -all in one day - he decides he has only one option: volunteer for the army. And he talks his friend Russell into enlising with him. Where else, they figure, can they help save the world for democracy....and meet girls! John and Russell find basic training a snap: they are arrested twice, have endless run-ins with their drill sergeant and get into a big mess at a female mud wrestling match. They even steal a top secret government vehicle to take some gorgeous female Mps on a date, and wind up behind the iron curtain. Stripes is outrageous fun!(n)

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
programme.desc: A romantic comedy chronicling multiple encounters between a shy British gentleman and an uninhibited American woman, who have their first brief meeting at a wedding and then continue to run into each other at subsequent sets of nuptials and one funeral(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Two paranormal researchers join forces with a nuclear engineer and a subway attendant to fight off a slew of ghosts that have invaded New York City. Eventually, they come face-to-face with an evil entity who can control human beings(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: The film revolves around the rivalry between the owners of a small gym named Average Joe's and Globo-Gym, a big-budget gym located across the street(n)

programme.title: Nine Months
programme.desc: Hugh Grant plays child psychiatrist Samuel Faulkner who, ironically, can't stand children. So when long-standing girlfriend Rebecca Taylor announces she's pregnant, he's less than thrilled and eventually, fed-up with his moaning, she moves out to stay with friends Marty and Gail Dwyer. This being a Chris Columbus film, it all ends happily but not without a lot of fun along the way, particularly from Robin Williams as Russian obstetrician Dr Kosevich who is not just prone to malapropisms, but hasn't actually delivered a baby before(n)

programme.title: Tales From the Hood
programme.desc: In this anthology of inner-city horror stories, a mortician shares grisly tales about his "patrons" when a group of crooks show up at his funeral home looking for a stash of drugs(n)

programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: Nick Cannon stars in this comedy thriller as a 24-year-old police detective who takes no small amount of ribbing from his fellow officers for his boyish looks. His appearance, however, lands him a plumb assignment at a posh private high school, where he discovers the students are operating an underground business stealing and selling luxury cars. The Underclassman also stars Cheech Marin, Roselyn Sanchez, and Kelly Hu(n)

programme.title: Sprung
programme.desc: Love turns into a battle of the sexes in this comedy starring Tisha Campbell and Paula Jai Parker. Best friends Adina (Parker) and Brandy (Campbell) start to grow apart when Brandy falls in love. So Adina devises a scheme to break up the two lovebirds. Rusty Cundieff, Joe Torry, Clarence Williams III(n)

programme.title: Dysfunctional Friends
programme.desc: Years after graduating college and going their separate ways, nine former friends reunite at the funeral of a quirky, wealthy acquaintance, and learn that they are all eligible for a big inheritance if they can just spend five days together at his former estate. Meanwhile, as the clock starts ticking, what first seemed like a lighthearted reunion quickly turns sour as old wounds are reopened, and lingering grudges are resurrected. Now if anyone leaves, everyone sacrifices their portion of the estate. And as the hours stretch into days, the prospect of being trapped in a mansion with people who know their deepest, darkest secrets grows increasingly unbearable for all involved. Christian Keyes, Stacy Kiebler, Stacey Dash, and Terrell Owens star(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is at his best in this comedy-drama about a sports agent who falls from the top of his profession. Jerry Maguire is a key agent at Sports Management International, with a string of high-profile clients, a stunning girlfriend called Avery (Kelly Preston) and all the friends he could want. But Jerry wants something else - a more caring spirit within his company. After setting out his ideas in a mission statement, Jerry finds himself unceremoniously fired, and everything he has worked so hard to achieve suddenly disappears. Fortunately, he is able to take with him one member of staff - single mother Dorothy Boyd (Renee Zellweger) - and one reluctant client, Rod Tidwell (Cuba Gooding, Jr). Armed with nothing but his charm, his good looks and the ability to sell just about anything to just about anyone, Jerry begins the long fight back to the top(n)

programme.title: Half of a Yellow Sun
programme.desc: Based on Nigerian author Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie's novel, set during the Nigerian-Biafran War(n)

programme.title: Senseless
programme.desc: A college student overwhelmed with debt agrees to be a guinea pig for the science department, unaware that the chemical he ingests heightens his five senses to unheard-of proportions. Marlon Wayans, David Spade, Matthew Lillard, Brad Dourif, Tamara Taylor, Rip Torn, Richard McGonagle, Esther Scott, Ken Lerner, Kenya Moore, Ernie Lively(n)

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Callie Khouri's comedy crime caper stars Diane Keaton, Queen Latifah and Katie Holmes as Bridget Cardigan, Nina Brewster and Jackie Truman, three women employed as janitors at the Kansas City Federal Reserve Bank. Bridget has only taken the job because her high-earning husband Don has been downsized and somebody has to earn the money to keep up their lifestyle. It breaks her heart to see the old bank notes being sent for shredding - surely nobody will miss a few. Enlisting the other two, they find a 'foolproof' way of helping themselves to just a little. And when they go undiscovered, it's tempting for a little to become a lot - but only if no one suspects three such lowly female workers..(n)

programme.title: What Dreams May Come
programme.desc: Los ganadores del premio Oscar Robin Williams y Cuba Gooding Jr., estelarizan en esta metafísica historia sobre la vida y lo que hay después de la muerte. Williams da vida a Chris Nielson, un hombre felizmente casado que está de luto por la muerte acciden(n)

programme.title: Empire State
programme.desc: A security guard and his best friend scheme to rob an armored-car company, but a determined cop is hot on their tail(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: Lemon Scented You. Trying to work things out with his dead and unfaithful wife, Shadow's reunion is interrupted when he and Mr. Wednesday are kidnapped by the New Gods(n)

programme.title: Tank Girl
programme.desc: In this laugh-a-minute, futuristic thriller, a mega-villian controls the world's water supply, and it's up to Tank Girl and her outrageous cohorts to end his greedy reign(n)

programme.title: The Grace Card
programme.desc: A police officer (Michael Joiner) consumed with bitterness following the death of his son rediscovers the power of faith after being assigned a new partner (Michael Higgenbottom), who was a minister before beginning his career in law enforcement(n)

programme.title: Red Hook Summer
programme.desc: In this affectionate slice of life, a boy from Atlanta spends a summer in Brooklyn under the watchful eye of his grandfather, a bishop at a local church, and he connects with a pretty girl who expands his understanding of the world(n)

programme.title: Buffalo Soldiers
programme.desc: Fact-based film about the Buffalo Soldiers, who protected the Western territories after the Civil War. The tale focuses on a sergeant and his black cavalry troop, who deal with racial tensions while attempting to capture a vicious Apache warrior(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: Lemon Scented You. Trying to work things out with his dead and unfaithful wife, Shadow's reunion is interrupted when he and Mr. Wednesday are kidnapped by the New Gods(n)

programme.title: In My Country
programme.desc: Langston Whitfield is an African-American journalist who is assigned to cover the South African Truth and Reconciliation Commission hearings by The Washington Post; Whitfield doubts the efficacy of this process, and sets out to interview Col. De Jager, a notorious former officer of the South African police who was famous for his violence against blacks, in order to put this method to the test(n)

programme.title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
programme.desc: Terry McMillan and Ron Bass wrote this screenplay based on McMillan's semi-autobiographical best-selling novel (over 2,000,000 copies in print before the release of this film). San Francisco stockbroker Stella (Angela Bassett), a 40-year-old divorcee, has a nice Marin County home and an 11-year-old son, Quincy (Michael J. Pagan). With Quincy off to see his dad, Stella and her best friend Delilah (Whoopi Goldberg) vacation in Jamaica, where she meets sexy, good-looking Winston Shakespeare (Taye Diggs). He's the man of her dreams in every way except one -- he's half her age. Even so, a romance develops. Grammy Award-winning songwriters Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis supervised the film's music and produced the R&B-slanted soundtrack album. Shown at the 1998 Urbanworld Film Festival (NY)(n)

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: In the frightmarish tradition of "The Blair Witch Project" comes this nerve-jangling chiller. Jennifer Carpenter is outstanding as a TV reporter who gets confined to a quarantined apartment complex in Los Angeles that houses a mysterious, scary secret. It isn't long before she learns why someone was "screaming bloody murder." A remake of the 2007 Spanish horror film "REC." Directed by John Erick Dowdle, who cowrote the script with Drew Dowdle. Steve Harris, Jay Hernandez, Johnathon Schaech(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: Lemon Scented You. Trying to work things out with his dead and unfaithful wife, Shadow's reunion is interrupted when he and Mr. Wednesday are kidnapped by the New Gods(n)

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: Following a cataclysmic world war, the leading world powers outlaw emotion, believing that doing so will reduce the chances of another conflict. Thought-police known as Clerics are sent to enforce the law and put offenders to death. When one Cleric accidentally misses a dose of the drug which suppresses his emotions, he begins to reconsider his role in the fight against expression(n)

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo
programme.desc: After an accident involving his pimp and an overly-aggressive dolphin, reluctant escort Deuce heads to Amsterdam. There he finds himself in danger from a mysterious gigolo killer. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Bye Bye, Love
programme.desc: A comedy about three single dads with weekend custody of their children who discover that, even though marriages end, familes last forever(n)

programme.title: Valentin
programme.desc: The world is not always what is seems when viewed through the eyes of an 8-year-old boy but even with a philandering father, an absentee mother and a cheerless grandmother, Valentin still finds amusement and wonder in life especially when plotting his future career as an astronaut(n)

programme.title: Madeline: Lost in Paris
programme.desc: Orphan Madeline shares a home with 11 other girls and their nun guardian. Chaos ensues when she escapes into the streets of Paris(n)

programme.title: dirtgirlworld
programme.desc: Leak. The importance of saving water is communicated(n)

programme.title: Cheaper by the Dozen 2
programme.desc: (2005) Steve Martin and Bonnie Hunt return as Tom and Kate Baker, parents to 12 kids, in Adam Shankman's sequel to the comedy hit. The children are now older, and getting ready to leave home, so Tom arranges a final family holiday in rural Wisconsin. Unfortunately, also at the campsite are his rival Jimmy Murtaugh (Eugene Levy), his trophy wife Sarina (Carmen Electra) and their eight offspring. But despite the two men trying to outdo each other, the two sets of kids become friends, with Sarah Baker and Eliot Murtaugh (Alyson Stoner and Taylor Lautner) touching as the two teenagers experiencing first love. M,W,R,S,HD(n)

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: In this funny and thrilling computer-animated Disney comedy, an orphaned science whiz invents a device to recover lost memories and is whisked into the future in a time-traveling space machine. Voices include Angela Bassett, Daniel Hansen, Jordan Fry, Wesley Singerman and Tom Selleck. Directed by Stephen J. Anderson(n)

programme.title: Big
programme.desc: A 13-year-old boy wants to be "big," and his wish is granted by a mechanical fortuneteller at a traveling carnival. After seeing what it is to live in an adult world, he wants his old life back and has to find the same wizard to reverse his wish(n)

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: Don Bluth and Gary Goldman's animated drama is loosely based on the story of Anastasia, grand-daughter of the last Tsar of Russia. When the family is killed, only Anastasia and her grandmother escape, but they are separated. Years later, conmen Dimitri and Vladimir hear of a reward for the return of Anastasia to her grandmother and begin preparing Anya to play the part, little realising that the teenage girl is, in fact, the real Anastasia. With Christopher Lloyd as the voice of Rasputin who, trapped in limbo, can only escape if his curse is fulfilled and the Tsar's bloodline is finally ended(n)

programme.title: The Game Plan
programme.desc: Family sports comedy about a successful football player who has to sacrifice his career to look after the seven-year-old daughter he never knew he had. The fun-loving bachelor, whose gridiron career is about to take off, is shocked to learn he has a young daughter from a forgotten fling. Against the wishes of his ambitious agent, he immerses himself in fatherhood - exchanging training sessions for junior ballet classes, and touchdowns for dolls. Starring Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson, Madison Pettis, Kyra Sedgwick, Roselyn Sanchez, Morris Chestnut, Hayes MacArthur(n)

programme.title: Aquamarine
programme.desc: Elizabeth Allen's teen comedy stars Sara Paxton as Aquamarine, a mermaid who can take human form during the day and when dry. After being washed ashore in a storm, Aquamarine is befriended by Claire and Hailey. The three concoct a plan to win the heart of hunky lifeguard Raymond, infuriating the jealous Cecilia, who starts snooping around. Can Aquamarine guard her secret, will she learn about love and will she grant a wish for Hailey that will keep her and Emma friends?(n)

programme.title: Fever Pitch
programme.desc: Ben (Jimmy Fallon) must choose between his love for Lindsey (Drew Barrymore) and the baseball team he supports, the Boston Red Sox. Based on Nick Hornby's novel Fever Pitch. Based on Nick Hornby's novel Fever Pitch and released in America under that title, the two leads bring the same warmth and humour to their roles as their British counterparts. Even sports fans unfamiliar with baseball will know the pain that comes from attending an important function when your team are playing a crucial match(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A con artist named Scott Lang (Paul Rudd) gets a shot at redemption when his mentor (Michael Douglas) asks him to protect a superpowered suit. Donning the stunning technology, which shrinks him down to minuscule size, he fights off villains seeking to steal the invention, and organizes a heist that could save the world. Peyton Reed directs this high-octane superhero flick(n)

programme.title: War Room
programme.desc: A Christian family under worldly pressures is shown by a wise older woman (Karen Abercrombie) how to make a "war room" as a prayerful place in the home to turn the family's path around(n)

programme.title: Shorebreak: The Clark Little Story
programme.desc: Profiling photographer Clark Little, whose work focuses on shorebreak waves(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II
programme.desc: Paul Hogan returns as Mick 'Crocodile' Dundee in John Cornell's sequel to the hit comedy original. When Mick's girlfriend Sue Charlton comes into possession of incriminating photographs concerning the drugs baron Rico, he kidnaps her. Mick must use all of his bush craft, both in America and in his native Outback, to free her and collar the baddies(n)

programme.title: Next Avengers: Heroes of Tomorrow
programme.desc: When a nefarious villain named Ultron emerges to threaten mankind, the next generation of superheroes leaps into action and prepares to make their famous parents proud. It's been decades since Ultron defeated the original Avengers, and these days even the few folks that had held out hope for the future are finally ready to admit defeat. But Tony Stark has a surprise up his sleeve in the form of four amazing teenagers who just might have the power to defeat Ultron once and for all. But will James (son of Captain America and Black Widow), Pym (son of Wasp and Giant Man), Torunn (daughter of Thor) and Azari (son of the Black Panther) truly be capable of defeating the villain who brought about the downfall of their powerful parents? As the battle gets underway and Hawkeye's sharp-shooting son leaps into the fray, the team realizes that they might stand a fighting chance if they can only track down the mission Hulk and encourage him to become a member of the team. Should they succeed in defeating Ultron, this group will forever be known as The Next Avengers(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Fred Flintstone finally gets the job he's always wanted, but it may just come at a price(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: This "prehysterical" live-action farce is a prequel to 1994's "The Flintstones" and recalls the early days of Fred and Wilma's courtship. While the couple hang out with Barney and Betty in Rock Vegas, Wilma's ex tries to come between her and Fred. Mark Addy, Kristen Johnston, Stephen Baldwin, Jane Krakowski, Thomas Gibson, Joan Collins(n)

programme.title: Tuck Everlasting
programme.desc: If you could choose to live forever, would you? That's the thought-provoking question posed in Natalie Babbitt's famous novel, and this film based on it. The story centres round Winnie, a girl who lives in a very strict household where there's very little love or fun to be had. Then she discovers a mysterious family living in the grounds of the house, and falls in love with one of them. Jesse returns her affection, but then divulges his family's secret: they are immortals - people who will live forever since they drank from a magical spring. If Winnie wants to be with Jesse she must become immortal too. But there are lots of disadvantages - what will she choose? Teenage romance with a message in this touching family drama(n)

Wynonna Earp

programme.title: Wynonna Earp
programme.desc: House of Memories. An admirer with a gruesome vendetta puts someone familiar in a tight spot. Meanwhile, Wynonna needs to outsmart Bobo Del Rey; and at the same time, protect Dolls from a new threat(n)

programme.title: Wynonna Earp
programme.desc: I Walk the Line. In the Season 1 finale, the costs are high when Wynonna finds herself in a showdown with a most terrifying nemesis. Meanwhile, something shocking about Waverly's past comes to light; and an impossible choice is faced by Dolls(n)

programme.title: Identity theft: learn about it and how to get LifeLock protection
programme.desc: Are you at risk for identity theft? Get the facts from experts, and hear stories from victims. Discover how LifeLock can help protect you – with proprietary technology, and U.S.-based agents who help set things right if your identity is ever stolen(n)

programme.desc: Paid Programming(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Nervous Man in a $4 Room. Though obviously an episode designed to absorb the costs of the more expensive Twilight Zone installments, this was one of the better efforts of the series' second season, with a tour de force performance by Joe Mantell as penny-ante gangster Jackie Rhoades. Ordered to bump off a rival gangster, the timorous Rhoades tries to summon up the courage for the foul deed, only to be thwarted at every turn by his own conscience -- who as it turns out has more "guts" than Jackie ever dreamed of. Though essentially a solo endeavor, the episode also features a good performance from future producer-director William D. Gordon as Jackie's nasty boss, while another future director, Brian G. Hutton, serves as Joe Mantell's back-to-camera stand-in when the actor "confronts" himself. Written by Rod Serling and scored by Jerry Goldsmith, "Nervous Man in a Four Dollar Room" was the first episode produced for Twilight Zone's second season, even though it was telecast as the third episode, on October 14, 1960(n)

programme.title: Aladdin and the Death Lamp
programme.desc: Aladdin must trick a malicious genie back into his lamp before he takes over the world(n)

programme.title: Seventh Son
programme.desc: A knight and his brave apprentice battle a malevolent witch plotting war against mankind(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Hercules
programme.desc: In the origin story of Hercules, the heroic son of Zeus embraces his incredible destiny by fighting to reclaim his kingdom from his villainous stepfather in this sweeping mythological adventure from director Renny Harlin (Cliffhanger, Die Hard 2). Born half-man/half-god and imbued with awe-inspiring superhuman strength, Hercules (Kellan Lutz) falls into a forbidden romance that quickly incurs the wrath of his calculating stepfather, the King. Subsequently exiled and forced into slavery, the heroic Hercules fights for his life as a gladiator, and vows to free his people from the tyranny of the evil monarch. Roxanne McKee, Johnathon Schaech, and Rade Serbedzija co-star(n)

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: David Fincher's The Curious Case of Benjamin Button, an adaptation of F. Scott Fitzgerald's story, re-teams the director with Brad Pitt, who takes on the title role. What makes Button such a curious case is that when he is born in New Orleans just after World War I, he is already in his eighties, and proceeds to live his life aging in reverse. This sweeping film follows the character's unusual life into the 21st century as he experiences joy and sadness, loves lost and found, and the meaning of timelessness. Cate Blanchett co-stars along with Tilda Swinton, Elias Koteas, and Julia Ormond(n)

programme.title: Odd Thomas

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Nervous Man in a $4 Room. Though obviously an episode designed to absorb the costs of the more expensive Twilight Zone installments, this was one of the better efforts of the series' second season, with a tour de force performance by Joe Mantell as penny-ante gangster Jackie Rhoades. Ordered to bump off a rival gangster, the timorous Rhoades tries to summon up the courage for the foul deed, only to be thwarted at every turn by his own conscience -- who as it turns out has more "guts" than Jackie ever dreamed of. Though essentially a solo endeavor, the episode also features a good performance from future producer-director William D. Gordon as Jackie's nasty boss, while another future director, Brian G. Hutton, serves as Joe Mantell's back-to-camera stand-in when the actor "confronts" himself. Written by Rod Serling and scored by Jerry Goldsmith, "Nervous Man in a Four Dollar Room" was the first episode produced for Twilight Zone's second season, even though it was telecast as the third episode, on October 14, 1960(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: High School. Despite bitter memories of how the "cool kids" rejected and humiliated him, Ray (Ray Romano) attends his 20th high school reunion, with Debra (Patricia Heaton) in tow. To his horror, Ray discovers that Debra was regarded as "cool" herself in her school days--and even worse, she is greeted by his former tormenters with open arms. Can Debra's marriage to the "ultimate nerd" be saved? Bob Odenkirk (Mr. Show) guest stars(n)

Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett, James Coburn(n)

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Overweight scientific genius Sherman Klump and his extended family are back in this sequel to the 1996 comedy smash The Nutty Professor. Sherman (played once again by Eddie Murphy) has come up with a discovery that ought to make him a multimillionaire: a youth serum that turns back the user's body clock. Sherman has also found time for a social life and has fallen in love with Denise Gains (Janet Jackson), a brilliant woman involved in DNA research. Sherman and Denise are engaged, but Sherman is still troubled by Buddy Love, the dark side of his personality that he wants to purge from his psyche forever. He persuades Denise to help him by splicing Buddy out of his DNA structure, but the experiment doesn't go as planned: instead of destroying Buddy, Sherman and Denise free him, and Buddy's first order of business is to get his hands on Sherman's youth serum, which Sherman has hidden at his family's house. In addition to Klump and Love, Murphy also plays Mama, Papa, Grandma, and nephew Ernie Klump, thanks to the makeup magic of Rick Baker(n)

programme.desc: The Psychic Vortex. However, when they score and get two girls back to their apartment, their week takes an unexpected turn. Meanwhile, Leonard learns that Penny believes in psychics, and his frustration over it causes her to dislike him. The only way Leonard can get Penny back now, is to meet the psychic and see how real it is(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea's Big Happy Family
programme.desc: Adapted from the multi-talented playwright/filmmaker's hit stage play of the same name, Tyler Perry's Madea's Big Happy Family finds the cantankerous family matriarch using her unique brand of tough love to help her family weather some particularly rough waters. Madea's niece Shirley has received a frightening medical diagnosis, and she's having a hard time figuring out how to break the news to the rest of the family. Unfortunately she's not the only one in the midst of a crisis, either: Kimberly is suffering from anger issues that are threatening to destroy her marriage; Tammy's marital problems are being compounded by her disobedient children; and Byron is struggling to stay out of the drug trade after spending two years behind bars. Later, as a skeleton in the family closet pops into the picture, Madea and Aunt Bam show that love and laugher can help to overcome even the biggest obstacles(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Time-travel comedy in which 80s high school kid Marty McFly is accidentally sent back to the 50s in a DeLorean time machine. He inadvertently prevents his parents' first meeting as teenagers, then finds his mother is attracted to him instead of his dull father. Marty's existence is under threat - unless he can make his parents fall in love. Can he play matchmaker, sort out his family tree and get back to the future?(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future Part II
programme.desc: Second instalment of the blockbuster trilogy starring Michael J Fox as time-traveller Marty McFly. Aided and abetted by the eccentric Doc Brown, Marty travels both forward and backwards through the decades to thwart the actions of arch-rival Biff Tannen who threatens not only Marty's offspring, but his own genesis!(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future Part III
programme.desc: The final episode in the fast-paced Back to the Future trilogy has time traveler Marty McFly heading back to the Old West to save his pal Doc, the inventor of the magical DeLorean time-traveling machine that took Marty back to the 1950s in the first film and shot him into the 21st century for the second episode. Marty's latest journey began at the end of Part II when he received a letter dated 1885 from Doc, who was accidentally stranded in 1885 by a stray bolt of lightning. The letter says that he cannot come home until he repairs the DeLorean, which he buried in the desert to keep it safe. Marty goes to dig it up so he can fix it and rescue Doc. Unfortunately, he is en route to the sight when he finds a tombstone with his friend's name on it; beneath it are the mysterious words "With Love from Clara." The date reads 1885. Marty realizes that if he cannot prevent Doc's early demise that Doc will never have existed and that will cause all kinds of problems. Unfortunately, no sooner does McFly make it back to the past, where he adopts the name "Clint Eastwood" when he gets into trouble, leaving his forbears to save him. Meanwhile, Doc, who is still alive, falls in love with the beauteous schoolmarm Clara Clayton, the girl he knows he must marry. They meet when he saves her from a runaway wagon. When not wrestling with their own problems, Marty and Doc must figure out how to fix the disabled DeLorean so they can return to the present. Needing the car to go 88 mph before it can breach time, the two devise a crazy scheme involving a stolen train, an uncompleted stretch of track and a yawning gorge that comprises the story's thrilling highlight(n)

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby

programme.title: Rush Hour 2

This time, they're on Chan's turf, in China, for a well-earned rest but the murder of US Customs men by one of the most powerful Triad gangsters in Asia sees them back in the thick of things, in the company of femme fatale Zhang Ziyi and secret-service agent Roselyn Sanchez. Some Mandarin/Cantonese with English subtitles(n)

Western, starring Gary Cooper, Grace Kelly, Lloyd Bridges and Lee Van Cleef.(n)

Sci-fi adventure, the first movie based on the TV series, starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley and Persis Khambatta.(n)

The US and Russian navies think he is planning to attack and set out to destroy the submarine, but a CIA analyst suspects he intends to defect to the West. Cold War thriller, based on Tom Clancy's novel, starring Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin and James Earl Jones.(n)

programme.desc: Palekaiko. When an abducted woman is found with almost no memory of the event, Five-0 investigate and are embroiled in a complex case that keeps them guessing(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The Collar. A priest who is given information by a murder suspect in the suspect's flat refuses to tell the police what he knows. While McCoy respects the cleric's stand, he questions whether the confessional seal should apply, since the parties didn't meet in church(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Undercovered. The father of a dying girl gets his revenge on an insurance executive who denied a certain leukemia treatment for his daughter. One problem arises when the father is technically on both sides of the law(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: DR 1-102. The investigation of the killings of two women leads to a hostage situation, in which Southerlyn responds to the suspect's request for a lawyer. Solomon: John Benjamin Hickey. Lydia Fernands: Susan Blackwell. Michael Hobbs: Gene Silvers. Alicia Williams: Debrah Ellen Waller. Capt. Bolland: David DeBeck. Lewin: Dianne Wiest. Southerlyn: Elisabeth Rohm. McCoy: Sam Waterston(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Missing. The disappearance of a young woman who was a political aide involves a married state official, his wife, a menacing friend and a forged signature(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Access Nation. The murder of a psychologist leads to a case involving a computer company that sells information and their responsibility in shielding their clients' history in order to serve their needs(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Born Again. An investigation into the death of a young girl leads to the suspected involvement of the girl's mother and a 'rebirthing' therapist(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Girl Most Likely. A high school girl is found murdered in the laundry room of her building. The ensuing investigation reveals that the dead girl had informed upon several of her classmates, who were running a website which spread vicious sexual rumors about their peers. The solution to the murder may hinge upon the eyewitness testimony of the victim's best friend -- if only the DA's office can persuade the reluctant friend to testify(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Equal Rights. Did an abused wife hire her brother-in-law to kill her husband? The DA's office believes she did, but is it really the case?(n)

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: A British agent and a scientist break into Alcatraz to foil terrorists who are threatening to launch chemical weapons into San Francisco(n)

programme.title: G.I. Jane
programme.desc: A hard-edged, tough, action movie that looks at one woman's struggle to succeed in the ultimate man's world. Lt Jordan O'Neil makes history when she is recruited as a test case to be the first woman allowed to train for the élite covert operations unit, the Navy SEALs. Facing derision from resentful officers as well as the men with whom she wishes to serve, she needs every ounce of her courage and determination to overcome the obstacles put in her path, pass the gruelling training and become a member of one of the toughest fighting forces in the world. Her struggle is made even harder when she learns that even the 'feminist' senator DeHaven , who made her selection for the SEALs possible, is equally eager for her to drop out(n)

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: An elite policeman is demoted after refusing to betray his partner and is later assigned to guard a narcotics kingpin on his way to jail. But the druglord has offered a huge reward to anyone who can free him from custody(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Biopic of Chris Kyle, the most-celebrated sniper in American military history. In the aftermath of 9/11, Kyle decides to serve his country by becoming a Navy SEAL. But with each tour of duty, he grows more detached from his wife and children(n)

programme.title: Animal Kingdom
programme.desc: Eat What You Kill. A risky heist misfires and the boys blame Smurf, sending shock waves through the family, in the Season 2 premiere. Also: Baz deals with being a single parent; and Deran plans for the future(n)

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: A British agent and a scientist break into Alcatraz to foil terrorists who are threatening to launch chemical weapons into San Francisco(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Publish and Perish. Filling in for Green, Det. Nick Falc works with Fontana to solve a porn star's murder(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Slaughter. The investigation of a student's killing leads to a case involving meat contamination at a food service. Bill Talbot: Philip Casnoff. Jim Dittmar: Stephen Bogardus. Arthur King: Jesse Doran. Mrs. Hatcher: Catherine Davis Cox. Mr. Hatcher: Joseph Costa. Brisoce: Jerry Orbach. Southerlyn: Elisabeth Rohm. McCoy: Sam Waterston(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Dazzled. A covetous young wife of a wealthy attorney is found murdered on an apartment terrace. The detectives interview the elderly husband, who seems to be too "dazzled" by his late wife to be of any help. After running through such suspects as a disgruntled former boyfriend and an alcoholic ex-wife, the police and the D.A.'s office finally zero in on a person whose motives, under any other circumstances, could be described as noble and selfless(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Foul Play. The investigation into the death of a private investigator uncovers corruption, deceit, and immigration fraud in a Youth Baseball League whose manager will go to any lengths to win(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Attorney Client. The wife of an attorney with many disgruntled clients is killed, but the detectives believe that he was the intended target as he was willing to reveal information despite confidentiality agreements(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Oxymoron. At first glance, it is assumed that a murdered woman was a professional escort. But a clue found in the corpse's pocket leads the detectives to a "swingers party," where the victim had been in a fight with another woman. It is then revealed that the dead woman was a doctor who had been writing fraudulent prescriptions for the illegal painkiller Oxycodone. The outcome of the case is determined by an apparent betrayal within the ranks of a mob family(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Patriot. In the season finale, the detectives come to believe that a victim in a building explosion may have been a terrorist(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: American Jihad. An American Muslim (Wil Horneff) defends himself against charges that he murdered an academic who challenged his religious beliefs. DA Arthur Branch: Fred Dalton Thompson. Ed Landen: Richard Bekins. Francine Landen: Robin Mattson. Judge Borke: Donna Hanover. Green: Jesse L. Martin(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Shangri-La. Briscoe (Jerry Orbach) and Green (Jesse L. Martin) investigate the murder of a high school English teacher. Their prime suspect is shy student Fiona Reed (Stephi Lineburg), a troubled teenager who, by all accounts, is the product of a miserable, abusive home environment. Digging a bit deeper, the detectives and lawyers McCoy (Sam Waterston) and Southerlyn (Elisabeth Rohm) make the startling discovery that Fiona is not all that she claims to be -- and is not, in fact, even a teenager(n)

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Tom Cruise and Jack Nicholson star in a compelling drama in which a young and impetuous naval lieutenant and a more experienced officer are given the job of defending two marines accused of murder. As the two officers come to terms with one another, their investigation uncovers some sinister secrets and collusion at the highest level. The marines' commanding officer certainly has no intention of making the truth public(n)
